name: DAMAGE CONTROL
description: Control your squad of engineers and maintain your ship, and it's crew, until it reaches it's destination. Careful planning and timing will be required to tackle the dangers of deep space. Only your team stands between your sturdy ship and and certain doom. Take command!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 Processor: 2ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
